summary: This mod allows external programs to retrieve information about Skyrim and interact with Skyrim by sending JSON requests over HTTP.
descriptionHtml:
This mod acts as a connector that allows external applications to control Skyrim and retrieve information from it.

The way this works is by starting a small web server inside your game after you load a save.

After this server is started, external programs can send requests to it. These requests could do things like get your position and the name of the cell/world space you are in. Other types of requests could do things like move you to another cell or place in the world.

It's very much a work in progress right now, and not many features have been implemented.

Installation is very easy. You can either download this mod through a mod manager or you can manually download and extract the contents.

This mod consists of:[list]
[*][size=2]A regular Skyrim ESP file. This contains the glue needed to start up the scripts responsible for communicating to the native part (An included SKSE plugin) of this mod.[/size]
[*][size=2]A BSA archive containing the scripts needed for this mod to work.[/size]
[*][size=2]An SKSE plugin. This is what does all the heavy lifting. It contains a web server and other code necessary to allow this mod to function.[/size]
[/list]
This mod also has a dependency on SkyUI. (MCM is used to manage settings)
